title: Game automatically closes few seconds after Victory/Defeat
body: This has been happening for me since a few patches ago. Doesn't matter how the game ended either by Nexus or Surrender. Once the game has either Victory or Defeat on my screen, the game closes itself after a few seconds returning me to the Client. No I didn't click on anything nor did I have my mouse anywhere near the Continue button. The bug isn't game breaking, but it is immersion breaking. Sometimes I just want to sit back and listen to the end-game music while contemplating on the the win/loss without having to read whatever is happening in the After Match lobby chat.

replies.body: Hmmmm that is kind of odd. AFAIK the Victory screen shouldn't be forcing you out at any specific time, but there's a chance that your connection is going dormant for some reason causing you to get kicked out. If that starts happening while the game is still going, make sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
I'm not really sure what solution to find on that page.
